summary: An ordinance ratifying and confirming a loan of the City of Seattle in the aggregate sum of $350,000 for the purpose of making additions and betterments to, and extensions of, the existing municipal street railway system owned and operated by the City of Seattle as set forth in detail in Ordinance No. 38090, of the City of Seattle, and as submitted at an authorized election held on the 5th day of March, 1918, and creating a fund into which money derived from the sale of said bonds and directing and authorizing the property officers of the City of Seattle in the same and disposal thereof.
